# Documentation Update (ACB Link Desktop)

You are updating user-facing documentation.

## Constraints
- Keep docs consistent with actual behavior and UI labels.
- Reflect accessibility changes (screen reader text, keyboard shortcuts).
- Use clear, plain language.

## Steps
1. Identify the doc sections impacted.
2. Update headings, steps, and screenshots/labels references.
3. Add accessibility notes if user-facing behavior changes.

## Output
- Files updated
- Summary of doc changes
- Any follow-up validation needed
